trans-unit.source: Hashtable and Dictionary Collection Types
trans-unit.target: 哈希表和字典集合类型

trans-unit.source: Hashtable and Dictionary Collection Types
trans-unit.target: 哈希表和字典集合类型

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: Hashtable and Dictionary Collection Types
trans-unit.target: 哈希表和字典集合类型

trans-unit.source: The [System.Collections.Hashtable](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Hashtable) class, and the [System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary-2) and [System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary-2) generic classes implement the [System.Collections.IDictionary](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.IDictionary) interface.
trans-unit.target: [System.Collections.Hashtable](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Hashtable) 类以及 [System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary-2) 和 [System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary-2) 泛型类实现 [System.Collections.IDictionary](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.IDictionary) 接口。

trans-unit.source: The `Dictionary<T>` generic class also implements the [IDictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary-2) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: `Dictionary<T>` 泛型类还实现 [IDictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary-2) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, each element in these collections is a key-and-value pair.
trans-unit.target: 因此，这些集合中的每个元素都是一个键值对。

trans-unit.source: A `Hashtable` object consists of buckets that contain the elements of the collection.
trans-unit.target: `Hashtable` 由包含集合元素的存储桶组成。

trans-unit.source: A bucket is a virtual subgroup of elements within the `Hashtable`, which makes searching and retrieving easier and faster than in most collections.
trans-unit.target: 存储桶是 `Hashtable` 中元素的虚拟子组，与在大多数集合中进行搜索和检索相比，其搜索和检索更加容易和快速。

trans-unit.source: Each bucket is associated with a hash code, which is generated using a hash function and is based on the key of the element.
trans-unit.target: 每个存储桶都与一个哈希代码相关联，该哈希代码通过哈希函数生成并基于元素的键。

trans-unit.source: The generic [HashSet<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.HashSet-1) class is an unordered collection for containing unique elements.
trans-unit.target: 泛型 [HashSet<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.HashSet-1) 类是用于包含唯一元素的无序集合。

trans-unit.source: A hash function is an algorithm that returns a numeric hash code based on a key.
trans-unit.target: 哈希函数是一种算法，返回基于键的数值哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The key is the value of some property of the object being stored.
trans-unit.target: 该键是所存储对象的某个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: A hash function must always return the same hash code for the same key.
trans-unit.target: 哈希函数必须始终返回同一个键的同一哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a hash function to generate the same hash code for two different keys, but a hash function that generates a unique hash code for each unique key results in better performance when retrieving elements from the hash table.
trans-unit.target: 哈希函数有可能为两个不同的键生成相同的哈希代码，但从哈希表中检索元素时，为每个唯一的键生成唯一哈希代码的哈希函数具有更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: Each object that is used as an element in a `Hashtable` must be able to generate a hash code for itself by using an implementation of the `GetHashCode` method.
trans-unit.target: 在 `Hashtable` 中用作元素的每个对象必须能够通过使用 `GetHashCode` 方法的实现为自身生成哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: When an object is added to a `Hashtable`, it is stored in the bucket that is associated with the hash code that matches the object's hash code.
trans-unit.target: 当将对象添加到 `Hashtable`时，其存储在与哈希代码相关联的存储桶中，此哈希代码匹配该对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: When a value is being searched for in the `Hashtable`, the hash code is generated for that value, and the bucket associated with that hash code is searched.
trans-unit.target: 当在 `Hashtable` 中对一个值进行搜索时，则为该值生成哈希代码，并搜索与该哈希代码相关联的存储桶。

trans-unit.source: For example, a hash function for a string might take the ASCII codes of each character in the string and add them together to generate a hash code.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用于字符串的哈希函数可能采用字符串中每个字符的 ASCII 代码，并将它们加总以生成哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The string "picnic" would have a hash code that is different from the hash code for the string "basket"; therefore, the strings "picnic" and "basket" would be in different buckets.
trans-unit.target: 字符串“picnic”的哈希代码可能与字符串“basket”的哈希代码不同；因此，字符串“picnic”和“basket”可能在不同的存储桶中。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, "stressed" and "desserts" would have the same hash code and would be in the same bucket.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，“stressed”和“desserts”可能具有相同的哈希代码，并且位于同一个存储桶中。

trans-unit.source: The `Dictionary<T>` and `ConcurrentDictionary<T>` classes have the same functionality as the `Hashtable` class.
trans-unit.target: `Dictionary<T>` 和 `ConcurrentDictionary<T>` 类具有与 `Hashtable` 类相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: A `Dictionary<T>` of a specific type (other than `Object`) provides better performance than a `Hashtable` for value types.
trans-unit.target: 特定类型（不包括 `Object`）的 `Dictionary<T>` 与 `Hashtable` 相比可为值类型提供更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: This is because the elements of `Hashtable` are of type `Object`; therefore, boxing and unboxing typically occur when you store or retrieve a value type.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 `Hashtable` 的元素属于 `Object` 类型；因此，装箱和取消装箱通常发生在存储或检索值类型时。

trans-unit.source: The `ConcurrentDictionary<T>` class should be used when multiple threads might be accessing the collection simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 可能有多个线程同时访问该集合时，应使用 `ConcurrentDictionary<T>` 类。

trans-unit.target: 另请参阅
